item.name: Amber
item.comment: Interesting one. Easy and quick, but with a lot of fun.

item.name: The Cave
item.comment: Nice, even better than nice. If you want to feel the thrill of exploration, take chances and like to plan your moves, you will love The Cave. NOTE: There is absolutely NO negative interaction in The Cave!

item.name: Chaos in the Old World: The Horned Rat Expansion
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)
Drako
item.comment: Very nice filler. Asymetrical fight for casual players. Experienced players could feel disapointment for random card draw, but this game is casual-oriented and as a quick and nice filler and it fits its role perfectly.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
In the Year of the Dragon
Keyflower
item.comment: A positive surprise. Very nice one.

item.name: Lords of Xidit: Bonus Titans Promo
Mercurius
item.comment: Quite interesting stock market game. Two parallel markets and special actions make each game unique. I love the interaction between players.

item.name: Myrmes
item.comment: Lot's of hopes, but... not so much fun as I expected. But, it is still a good game ;). Especially for players less "geeky" :)

item.name: Rex: Final Days of an Empire
Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Snowdonia
item.comment: Nice. Clear rules, interesting ideas. Love to play again

item.name: Spartacus: A Game of Blood & Treachery
Talisman (fourth edition): The Sacred Pool Expansion
Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 2 – India & Switzerland
